text: Branislav Kubka (born August 15, 1988) is a Slovak professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for HKM Zvolen of the Tipsport Liga. Kubka made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Plzeň during the 2013-14 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:People from Detva District Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen Category:HC 07 Detva players Category:HC '05 Banská Bystrica players Category:HC Karlovy Vary players Category:HC Baník Sokolov players Category:HC Plzeň players Category:HK Nitra players Category:HKM Zvolen players
title: Branislav Kubka
